title: conferred on me by section 27(2) of the Consumer Insurance Contracts Act 2019
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Consumer Insurance Contracts Act 2019
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Consumer Insurance Contracts Act 2019 

(Commencement) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited consumer insurance contract act 2019 (commencement) order 2020

title: conferred on me by section 27(2) of the Consumer Insurance Contracts Act 2019
heading: In this Order, “Act” means the Consumer Insurance Contracts Act 2019
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order, “Act” means the Consumer Insurance Contracts Act 2019 

(No. 53 of 2019).
text_norm: 2 order act mean consumer insurance contract act 2019 (no 53 2019)

title: conferred on me by section 27(2) of the Consumer Insurance Contracts Act 2019
heading: 3. The 1st day of September 2020 is appointed as the day on which the Act,
text_raw:
3. The 1st day of September 2020 is appointed as the day on which the Act, 

other than – 

(a) 

(b) 

subsection (4) of section 18, and 

the provisions of the Act specified in Article 4, 

shall come into operation.
text_norm: 3 1st day september 2020 appointed day act - (a) (b) subsection (4) section 18 provision act specified article 4 shall come operation

title: conferred on me by section 27(2) of the Consumer Insurance Contracts Act 2019
heading: 4. The 1st day of September 2021 is appointed as the day on which sections
text_raw:
4. The 1st day of September 2021 is appointed as the day on which sections 
8, 9 and 12 and subsections (1) to (5) of section 14 of the Act shall come into 
operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

31 August, 2020. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 4th September, 2020.
